text:
A lot of people were shocked when several big names including that of Alok Nath and Vikas Bahl were called out for sexual harassment in the wake of the #MeToo movement that is still taking India by storm. However, many in the industry knew about these sexual predators for probably years but kept mum for reasons best known to them. The industry which is known for its glitz and glamour looks quite attractive from the outside, but there are a lot of dirty secrets that hide beneath and some of them are finally coming out now.
Another name that was embroiled in the #MeToo movement that shocked people was of Sajid Khan. Not one or two, but quite a few women including Bipasha Basu, Amrita Puri and Mandana Karimi have accused him of sexual misconduct.
Twitter
Sajid Khan’s sister Farah Khan recently commented on the ongoing movement and said that she fears quick judgements and punishments, and trial by Twitter.
“I am against fear psychosis for anybody whether it is for a woman or for a man who is talking to a girl and getting scared that should I be talking like this. We want to have to have a happy positive environment, so that is most important. The only thing I fear are the quick judgments and the quick punishments that are meted out through trial by Twitter which is happening in hours. Even in Hollywood they take their time, they do their research, they do an investigation. They interview friends and family, whether it is 20 years ago or 10 years ago- they investigate. So that is a bit scary for everybody,” she was quoted as saying by RepublicTV.
